=== About Me ===
Hello, I'm Joseph Walton-Rivers (better known as Webpigeon on IRC and launchpad). I'm an 19 year old British student who uses Ubuntu and Debian. I have used Linux from year 10, running fedora as my Deskop operating System. I switched to Ubuntu with feisty fawn. I currently am part of the Ubuntu-UK Loco group (spending a lot of time on their IRC channel).

=== Things that I (used) do for Ubuntu ===
==== Unity Coders ====
* Provide programming support and guidance though UnityCoders

==== Ubuntu-UK ====
* Provide Support for new users in the Ubuntu-UK Channel
* Advocate the use of free software,
* Help out local users with problems that they encounter
* Try to attend meetings and be productive

==== Things I should do more of ====
** BZR and launchpad

** Bug Fixing/Tracking
** Updating the ubuntu-uk wiki
** Podcast transcription

==== Things I want to learn ====
* Packaging
* Proofreading my work
